TopicTitle: KSP Career mode EP01 (1.04) (with Mods including remote Tech)

Articles.Content:
Hello

I am not the best Kerbal player, nor am I the best lets player, But join me in my journey to get better at both.

I show both the good stuff I do, as well as the mistakes! which there is plenty! And I try not to revert or F9 unless there is a bug or something I do stupid, genuine mistakes and errors stay in

I would really like feedback on both my Kerbaling and my lets play style.

This is Episode 1, I have now posted up to episode 54.

Let me know what you think

Thanks

John Jarratt

(Aylwick)
